product_name: REI First-Aid Wound Cleaning Refill Kit
long_description: Keep your first-aid kit well stocked with this REI First-Aid Wound Cleaning refill kit. Clean wounds with the benzalkonium chloride towelettes. Treat infections in wounds with the povidone-iodine wipes and triple antibiotic ointment packets. Sanitize your hands with the alcohol hand cleaner wipe.
short_description: Keep your first-aid kit well stocked with this REI First-Aid Wound Cleaning refill kit.
